title: God Help Us All
lyrics:
God help us all
If the heavens are to fall
Stay by my side
If the sky rips open wide
Don't wait for me

If I'm not here when you return

If there's a God

You'll be crashing when you burn

You could steal white light

That shines upon the world one left to go

Singing out "sha la la la la"



If I'm just a man

Would I feel God's shifting sand

Come set me free

Cos the world won't let me be



Don't wait for me

If I'm not here when you return

Cos if there's a God

You'll be crashing when you burn

You could steal white light

That shines upon the world one left to go

Singing out "sha la la la la"



Don't wait for me

If I'm not here when you return

Cos if there's a God

You'll be crashing when you burn

You could steal white light

That shines upon the world one left to go

Singing out "sha la la la la"



God help us all

If the heavens are to fall

Stay by my side

If the sky rips open wide

Singing out "sha la la la la" (x6)



(Gracias a Daniel DÃ­az y Gilfredo Morales por esta letra)
